story_06_06000/2401_1001_0100_10:
You beat me!
That was a ton of fun, though.
story_06_06000/2401_1001_0200_10:
This just proves that the bond you and
your Pokémon share really is second to none!
story_06_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Thanks, Korrina! Thanks, Brendan!
Thanks to you guys, I feel more confident.
story_06_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I think we can get back to focusing on
collecting badges now.
story_06_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: Oh? Were you guys collecting badges?
story_06_06000/2401_1001_0600_10:
If that’s what you’re up to, I know a PML Leader
I can introduce you to!
story_06_06000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Hey, can I come with you, too?
You seem like a fun team to be around.
story_06_06000/2401_0401_1100_10:
Awesome! Now we’ll be able to battle
each other whenever we want!
story_06_06000/2401_0302_1200_10: Sure! I hope to learn more from you!
story_06_06000/2401_0402_1300_10:
All right! If you ever want to learn any
roller-skating tricks, like my rolling axe-kick,
I’m your girl!
story_06_06000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Bigger! Stronger!
More energy! More fun!
story_06_06000/2401_1001_1500_10: I look forward to our new adventures together!
